casebody.data:
Khalani CARR, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ROGER A. REED, INC., d/b/a Reed Wax, Amoco Oil Company, a/k/a BP Products North America, Inc., and The International Group, Inc., Defendants-Appellees,
and
Keller Heartt Company, Inc., and Sasol Wax North America Corporation, a/k/a Sasol Wax North America, Inc., a/k/a Sasol Chemicals USA, LLC, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Pros Service, Inc., Defendant. SC: 156221
COA: 330115 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 20, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
